    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerMain

        public ServerMain​(java.lang.String acceptedIp,
                  int port,
                  int loginTimerDuration,
                  int inputTimerDuration)
        build the serverMain class with its parameter
        Parameters:
        acceptedIp - the ip tha RMIServer can show outside
        port - the socket port of the server (RMI port = socketPort + 1)
        loginTimerDuration - the maxmum time to login before match starts
        inputTimerDuration - maximum time a player can wait to chose what to do
